name: Hose Your Daddy
description:
Submission for the GMTK Game Jam. 

Knock your opponent off the level with your Outta Control Hose!

CONTROLS:

  • Player 1: 
    • Left - A
    • Right -D 
    • Jump - W 
  • Player 2: 
    • Left - Left Arrow
    • Right -Right Arrow 
    • Jump - Up Arrow

Check the source code here: https://github.com/federoz/spacy-taxi'

Credits:

  • Fede Rozenberg: Gameplay, Systems, Game Design
  • Ross Arkin: Systems, UI, Programming, Game Design
  • Victor Lalo: Gameplay, Physics, Music
  • Karin Alyse: Character Design, Art, UI, Graphics
  • Lucca R Colombelli : Graphics, UI, Level Design, Game Design
